## methods

### statistical models

```{r models}
gee <- choose_corr(df, "PWV","id",
        c("time","ApneaIndex","time:ApneaIndex","age","sex","BMI","smoke"))
lme <- lmer(PWV ~ time*ApneaIndex + age + sex + (time|id), data=df)
```
